title: Dribble and Grub
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant and bar situated on Porthcressa Beach. Offers a range of vegetarian dishes from sandwiches to salads; uses dairy and egg. Staff is able to assist with veg and special diets.
streetAddress: The Old Fire Station, Porthcressa Beach, St. Mary's
